result.title: Having hard time with segmented trees ?
result.content: I was trying to solve this problem http://www.spoj.com/problems/GSS1/, after sometime I gave up and googled approach for it, I found this website https://kartikkukreja.wordpress.com/2014/11/09/a-simple-approach-to-segment-trees/ but still not able to understand problem and its solution.Plz help!
